DOC.brief_summary: This study aim identify risk factor development intrusive reexperiencing symptom . In particular , investigator examine influence work memory capacity think suppression occurrence unpleasant memory negative experience . Hypothesis : People high work memory capacity ( HWMC ) able successfully suppress memory unpleasant experience ( presentation distress movie ) . In contrast , people low work memory capacity ( LWMC ) , attempt suppress memory unpleasant experience inadvertently lead increase memory . Study phase one : Assessment work memory capacity 200 healthy participant mean computerized task . Selection 50 participant HWMC 50 participant LWMC participate study phase two . Study phase two : Presentation distress movie subsequent assessment memory movie several day daily life participant . Comparison 4 group regard frequency instruction daily life : ( group 1 : HWMC participant instruct suppress thought movie , group 2 : LWMC participant instruct suppress thought movie , group 3 : HWMC participant instruct allow occurence thought movie , group 4 : LWMC participant instruct allow occurence thought movie )
DOC.brief_title: Intrusive Reexperiencing : The Role Working Memory Capacity Thought Suppression
DOC.criteria: Older 17 year Insufficient knowledge German language , distress movie arm study : Elevated level depression posttraumatic stress symptom prior view distress movie
